Description: Pottery globular stirrup jar, Furumark Shape 171. Restored from fragments. Body painted with thick and thin red-brown bands. Parallel chevrons (FM 58) and dot rosettes (FM 27) in shoulder zone. Handles solid pained either side of circle on false spout.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt) (said to be from)
